entry.title: Monday: Rain or drizzle. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle early this morning. Rain beginning early this morning. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High 12.
